monster.name: Guz

trait.name: Reckless
trait.text: At the start of his turn, Guz can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Whirling Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Winghorn Press - The Wild Sheep Chase

monster.name: Bed Dragon Wyrmling

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Splinter Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The bed dragon sends out a shower of wooden splinters in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.description: Source: Winghorn Press - The Wild Sheep Chase

monster.name: Ahmed Noke

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
Ahmed is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:
• Cantrips: ray of frost, mending, prestidigitation, message • 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, jump, thunderwave • 2nd level (3 slots): enlarge/reduce, levitate • 2nd level (3 slots): haste, slow • 2nd level (1 slots): polymorph

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
